Playlist T-Dose 2007

T-DOSE 2007, Overtaking Propriatery Software Whithout Writing Code, Olivier Cleynen.

Overtaking Propriatery Software Whithout Writing Code
Free or 'Open Source' software, and in particular Linux, is doing extremely well technically. However, it fails to secure a significant portion of the protected, lucrative software market, especially for end-users. The main obstacles to overcoming the domination of propriatery software, most of them non-technical, require thinking outside of code-writing.

More at
http://www.t-dose.org/2007/speakers:

Technical Dutch Open Source Event.
October 13, 2007
Fontys Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2007, Overtaking Propriatery Software Whithout Writing Code, Olivier Cleynen
